title: Revert entire deployment back to Version 34 (frontend + backend)

requirements.text: Fully revert the project (both frontend and backend canister code) to the exact state of Version 34, with no partial retention of any changes introduced after Version 34.

quotes: ok no undo the last update entirely please
1 not version 35 but 34 2 yes return the app exactly to version 34 no partial keeps 3 yes backend revert because now backend does not recognize my admin account

acceptanceCriteria: The deployed frontend matches Version 34 behavior and UI exactly (no Version 35+ changes remain).
The deployed backend canister code matches Version 34 exactly (no Version 35+ methods/state logic changes remain).
The callerâ€™s admin account is recognized by the backend as it was in Version 34 (admin-only routes and actions work again for the same principal).

constraints: No partial keeps: do not retain any subset of the reverted update.
Include backend revert as well as frontend revert.
nonGoals: Implementing or modifying any features beyond restoring Version 34.
Refactoring or improving performance/navigation beyond what existed in Version 34.
Adding new admin role logic or changing admin assignment mechanisms.
